item.title: Building xCBC: a CBC to Discord Tool
item.description: Building xCBC: a CBC to Discord Tool Published: June 7th, 2023 For a while now, when linking to a CBC post on Discord, instead of generating a link preview using the Open Graph or Twitter meta tags, the link remains an undescriptive string that may hestiate to click on do to concerns around the trustworthiness and value of it. This, of course, leads to issues when you are in a community that likes to share news sources, if every other source has the preview, then CBC will be last choice to share.

item.title: Building a Gopher Server: An Adventure
item.description: Building a Gopher Server: An Advenure Published: November 30th, 2021 Updated: April 21th, 2022 I’ve always had a bit of an interest in older technology, from growing up watching tapes and VCDs during the peak years of DVDs, learning BASIC and FORTRAN during my school days, spending most of my adolescence on IRC, to going straight from playing the Super Mario Brothers Trilogy on NES to playing Halo on the original Xbox, I’ve definitely found enjoyment in the older school.

item.title: About
item.description: About Hello, my name is Julian Webb. I am a self-taught programmer, web developer, documenation reader and a pro-taught Network Engineer and System Administrator. In my hobbies, I frequently create things, sometimes finishing them. My hope is to document my process and learnings here, if only so I can go back and remember what I know. Experience As I don’t really have any current experience in the fields I wish to work in, have a link to my LinkedIn instead.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact I am open to emails about my projects, log entries, potential job opportunities. Do not email me about anything Web3. Email You can contact me via emailing any local-part at the current domain. Discord My discord username is Pongles#7210, I have unsolicited DMs turned off.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects This is the page where I list my completed projects: xCBC Middle-man service to scrape CBC metadata for Discord preview. Project Homepage Hadfield Gopher Server Hadfield is a Document-Based Gopher Server written in Javascript utilizing NodeJS. Project is in indefinite hiatus. Project Homepage
